title: How to Roll Down the Windows With Your Key Fob

steps.title: Press the unlock button on your key fob.
steps.content: Press the unlock button on your key fob. [1] X Research source Many car models use the key fob’s unlock button to remotely roll down the windows. [2] X Research source This feature works on many modern Honda, Ford, and Toyota models. This is a great way to cool down the inside of the car .

steps.title: Within a couple seconds, press the unlock button again and hold it down.
steps.content: Within a couple seconds, press the unlock button again and hold it down. The windows will start rolling down while you hold down the unlock button. [3] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source Note that some car models may only require pressing the unlock button once and holding it down to roll down the windows.

steps.title: Release the unlock button when the windows reach the height you want them to stop at.
steps.content: Release the unlock button when the windows reach the height you want them to stop at. [4] X Trustworthy Source Consumer Reports Nonprofit organization dedicated to consumer advocacy and product testing Go to source If you want to roll the windows down more, repeat the unlock button procedure. If the windows won’t close after rolling them down, you may need to manually roll up the window .

steps.title: Insert your car key into the driver’s door lock.
steps.content: Insert your car key into the driver’s door lock. Some cars (typically older models) may use the physical key to roll all of the windows down. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Turn the key clockwise until it stops.
steps.content: Turn the key clockwise until it stops. Don’t force the key beyond its stopping point or you may damage your car.

steps.title: Return the key to the starting position.
steps.content: Return the key to the starting position. The key should be in the position it was when you first inserted it. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Turn the key clockwise until it stops.
steps.content: Turn the key clockwise until it stops. Hold it in that position to begin rolling down the windows. [7] X Research source Note that some car models may require that you turn the key counterclockwise to roll down the windows.

steps.title: Return the key to the starting position.
steps.content: Return the key to the starting position. This will stop the windows at the height you want. [8] X Research source
